hero.introduction: As a web development student, I'm passionate about turning ideas into impactful digital experiences. I design intuitive and adaptable interfaces, blending creativity and code to deliver smooth and captivating interactions.

about.summary: In my journey as a web development student, I have discovered the power of designing interfaces that forge real connections. I specialize in building intuitive and responsive digital solutions that blend technology and design to create memorable experiences.
about.longDescription: I specialize in building modern and scalable web applications, focusing on clean code and great user experiences. My journey started with a curiosity about technology and a desire to create solutions that make an impact.

project1.title: Berry Jerry
project1.description: I collaborated with a colleague to develop a landing page for a vegetable store, improving their online presence.

project2.title: Nuestra Señora del Rosario
project2.description: I developed a complete informational website for the Santa Cruz Nursing Home, collaborating with my classmates in the engineering course working on the frontend and backend.

project3.title: Nuestra Señora Del Rosario - Admin
project3.description: This repository contains the frontend code for the Santa Cruz Nursing Home project. It's a responsive web application built with modern technologies to provide information about the nursing home services.

project4.title: Course Manage
project4.description: This project is a web application designed for course management. It allows users to create and manage courses.

contact.collaborationMessage: Download my resume or reach out to discuss collaboration opportunities.
